name: Perseid Meteor Shower
description: One of the brightest and most visible meteor showers of the year.
visibility: Excellent under dark skies after midnight.

name: Partial Lunar Eclipse
description: A small portion of the moon passes through Earth's shadow.

name: Jupiter at Opposition
description: Jupiter is at its closest point to Earth and fully illuminated by the Sun.
visibility: Brightest object in the midnight sky after the moon.

name: Geminids Meteor Shower
description: The 'King' of meteor showers, known for producing multi-colored meteors.
visibility: Moderate visibility due to waxing gibbous moon.
